welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Beltsville, a charming town known for its historic sites and natural beauty. We are thrilled to have you here and invite you to explore and experience all that our delightful city has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for American Airlines, Delta Air Lines, and United Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Alaska Airlines, JetBlue, and Southwest Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for Air Canada, Frontier Airlines, and Spirit Airlines.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baltimore/Washington International Thurgood Marshall Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for Southwest Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used for American Airlines and Spirit Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used for Delta Air Lines, United Airlines, and Alaska Airlines flights.

terminals.name: Concourse D
terminals.description: Concourse D is primarily used for international flights and is home to the airport's U.S. Customs and Border Protection facility.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lee Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lee Airport caters to private and corporate flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
